New Records: Ross Adair became the third Irish men's player to hit a T20I century
Their 137-run stand for the first wicket is Ireland's second-biggest T20I partnership
Key Match Events: Ross Adair's innings of 100 from just 58 deliveries
Mark Adair's 4-31 with the ball claimed a dramatic 10-run win
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was Ireland's highest T20I score against South Africa and 10th best of all-time in the format
Others: The two sides now turn their attentions to the three-match ODI series, which kicks off at the Zayed Cricket Stadium on Wednesday
